summary: A cynical former sheriff turned bounty hunter helps a young, recently appointed acting sheriff with his advice, his experience and his gun.
cast: Henry Fonda|Anthony Perkins|Betsy Palmer|Michel Ray|Neville Brand|John McIntire|Mary Webster|Peter Baldwin|Richard Shannon|Lee Van Cleef|James Bell|Howard Petrie|Russell Simpson|Hal K. Dawson|Jack Kenney|Mickey Finn|Walter Bacon|Sam Bagley|John Barton|Danny Borzage|John Bose|Paul Bradley|Chet Brandenburg|George Bruggeman|Nora Bush|Frank Cady|Frank Cordell|Jimmy Dime|Richard Farnsworth|Franklyn Farnum|Duke Fishman|Fritz Ford|Allen Gettel|Kit Guard|Herman Hack|Chuck Hamilton|Michael Jeffers|Bob Kenaston|Frank McGrath|'Snub' Pollard|Bob Reeves|John Roy|Lucile Sewall|Milan Smith|Cap Somers|George Sowards|Ray Spiker|Bert Stevens|Jack Stoney|Brick Sullivan|Tim Sullivan
title: Cazador de forajidos
